snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic is on a French Open semi-final collision course with nine-times champion Rafael Nadal after the draw was made on Friday....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic is on a French Open semi-final collision course with nine-times champion Rafael Nadal after the draw was made on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Nadal on Semi-Final Collision Course in Paris
headline.main: Djokovic, Nadal on Semi-Final Collision Course in Paris
